# minio_s3_bucket_quota (Resource)

Manages quota limits for S3 buckets in MinIO.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "minio_s3_bucket_quota" "example" {
  bucket = "example-bucket"
  quota  = 1073741824 # 1 GiB
  type   = "hard"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `bucket` (String) Name of the bucket
- `quota` (Number) Quota size in bytes

### Optional

- `type` (String) Quota type (only "hard" is supported)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import minio_s3_bucket_quota.example example-bucket
```
